thread.title: Joey Bada$$ - Land Of The Free
thread.title_full: Joey Bada$$ - Land Of The Free

author: Devon Jefferson
title: Joey Bada$$ - Land Of The Free
text:
0 NOT FEELING IT 0 MAKE IT STOP As promised Joey Bada$$ releases his new single/Martin Luther King Jr. tribute "Land Of The Free." 
When Joey Bada$$ shared the news that he was planning on releasing a Martin Luther King Jr. tribute on MLK day, a lot of us moved to the edge of our seats in anticipation of the single. Additionally, the snippet the rapper posted to break the news truly put listeners in a trance as he spits gripping bars from the very intro of the track. 
And as promised, Joey has released the single "Land Of The Free" and it is as legendary and important as we thought it would be. The Pro Era spitta ethers the whole track and delivers bars that leave you questioning the validity of social constructs and to an extent, your own identity. 
This release serves as the first single from his upcoming album AABA and while there is no release date for the project, this track should definitely hold us over until more details emerge. 
Check out the new track here and grab a download of the track here.
